videoDetails.Title: The Ultimate Guide for Grinding Silver Lions on War Thunder (Tips For New Players)
videoDetails.Description:
Play War thunder for free, Download at: 
 http://warthunder.com/en

In this Video I will be showing you the best ways on getting Silver Lions and some few tips on how to avoid losing silver Lions.

-War Thunder Research Guide: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nKJhFSAryiw

- UPDATED War Thunder Silver Lion Grind Guide: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NNZbHyU6qg0

-War Thunder Ground RB Tips: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hk3XWjI57Qg

- War Thunder Air RB Tips: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FObeDKLfiGI

I have been following everything mentioned in the video and believe me it has paid off really well. 

I REALLY hope you find this video useful, if you did and also learned something new, please like share and subscribe for more 
Thank you and have a Nice Day! 

00:00 - [ Intro ]
00:25- [ Wagers ]
01:23 - [ Simulator Battles ]
02:02 - [ Battle Pass ]
02:24 - [ Avoid Top Tier if you are not experience ]
03:12 - [ High Repair Cost Vehicles ]
03:19 - [ Auto-Repair ]
03:39 - [ Buy Premium ]
